The video was captured by William Turton: CPAC and #AmericaUncancelled, which are associated with the Conservative Political Action Conference (CPAC) 2021.
Steven Walker: a reporter for the Orlando Sentinel, posted a photograph of the statue at CPAC and reported that it was created by artist Tommy Zegan.
According to Zegan: s website, the statue is a humorous caricature of former President Donald Trump, made of stainless steel, standing at 6 feet 3 inches tall. It depicts Trump holding a copy of the constitution in one hand and a magic wand in the other.
The video and information about the stat: s creation and intentions were verified by Snopes, a reputable fact-checking organization.
